description:
Aspen is a fully featured high quality walking boot designed for little feet. Just like our adult boots Aspen is manufactured with top grade materials to cope with rough terrain and bad weather. Perfect for anything from hiking in the holidays, to the winter school run.

***Please Note: Sizing is in UK (See Size Chart for Reference)
name: Boreal (Spain) Aspen - Mens

specs.value: Premium quality 1,8mm split leather and waterproofed textile material. Tongue connected to the upper and rubber toe cap for protection
Sympatex® Moisture Tech for absolute waterproofness + stay cool breathability
Vibram Paw Kid with dual density rubber
From walking to school in bad weather to trekking and hiking in the holidays
